Message.En:
Resurrection of the Flame of Despair:
Evil Dragon Reborn
Message.Jp: 蘇りし絶望の炎　戦況：悪しき竜再誕

Message.En:
At Firefall Mountain, the Evil Dragon,
who was thought to be destroyed by Prince Nedo
and the Arisen of the White Dragon, has arisen again.
The malevolent dragon power that scattered has
merged with the everlasting flame of the mountain,
going against the flow of the earth's purification,
and has taken on the form of a dragon once again,
spewing darkness and despair.
Defeat the revived Evil Dragon and protect the hope
that has been bound and preserved!
Message.Jp:
火垂れ山にて、ネド王子と白竜の覚者により滅ぼされ
た悪しき竜だったが、四散した禍々しき竜力は
大地の浄化の流れに背くように山の不滅の炎と結び
つき、再び絶望を吐き散らす竜の姿となり動き出した
蘇った悪しき竜を討ち破り、つなぎ止めた希望を
死守せよ！

Message.En: Defeat the Evil Dragon who has regained its power.
Message.Jp: 力を取り戻した悪しき竜を討伐する

Message.En: Aim for the top of Firefall Mountain.
Message.Jp: 火垂れ山頂上を目指す

Message.En: Defeat all enemies blocking the middle section.
Message.Jp: 中腹を塞ぐ敵を全滅させる

Message.En:
Defeat all enemies blocking 
the entrance to the summit.
Message.Jp: 頂上への入口を塞ぐ敵を全滅させる

Message.En:
Gather at the waypoint and move to the summit
of Firefall Mountain.
Message.Jp: 進行マーカーへ集合し、火垂れ山頂上へ移動する

Message.En:
The Evil Dragon's attack power 
and defense power increase.
Message.Jp: 悪しき竜の攻撃力・防御力が上昇

Message.En:
Abnormal Status Effect on the player:
Items Sealed!
Message.Jp: プレイヤーに状態異常効果：アイテム封印

Message.En:
Abnormal Status Effect on the player:
Increased Stamina Consumption!
Message.Jp: プレイヤーに状態異常効果：スタミナ消費増加

Message.En:
Abnormal Status Effect on the player:
Enemy focus nullified!
Message.Jp: プレイヤーに状態異常効果：敵の注目無効

Message.En:
The environment of Firefall Mountain
is quickly deteriorating.
Message.Jp: 火垂れ山の環境が悪化
【征圧完了】報酬を獲得する（残り１分）
